data.title: Horseshoe (Short 1998)
data.meta_description: Horseshoe: Directed by David Lodge. With Alan Hickman, Lyn Waldegrave, Louis, Diane Simmons. An elderly man has his dental appointment confirmed, he walks there from a group of tall apartment blocks, has a mould made of his teeth, it is rejected and another made. That's it. Filmed in retro scratchy and spotty sepia throughout.
